en:
几度春风几度霜
(Jǐ dù chūnfēng jǐ dù shuāng)

Several times a few degrees spring frost

Translations of 几度春风几度霜
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

几度
    Several times, Several times to, A few degrees, A few degrees of, Few degrees of
几度
    a few degrees, several times, several times to, few degrees, a few degrees of
春风
    spring, Chunfeng, spring breeze, of spring, spring breeze of
霜
    frost, Cream, creams, the cream, defrost
ja:
几度春风几度霜
(Jǐ dù chūnfēng jǐ dù shuāng)

数回、数度の春の霜
(Sū-kai,-sū-do no harunoshimo)

春风
